      • getMooreRadiusAtHeight

        protected int getMooreRadiusAtHeight(int height,
                                     int trunkHeight)
        参数:
        height - The block height at which this radius is being taken (starting from 0).
        trunkHeight - The height of the trunk.
        返回:
        The maximum radius outside the center block that the tree can take up at this height value.
